 Rising into "Plainview" over well-travelled horizons, "Citylanes Airplanes" becomes reimagined once more in an edition of very special proportions. Mango finds a brand new vehicle for continued success as artists from across global continents coalesce into homogeneous form, united by a single purpose in revisiting a work of beauty and poise. Familiar refrains echo across spring breeze; 'pillow' shaped clouds rise above 'the shore' and 'disappear' in a forever 'changing landscape'.
 New renditions blaze vibrant vapour trails Ã¢â‚¬â€œ beats and melody in joyous synchronicity. Soft vocals whisper in undulating fashion Ã¢â‚¬â€œ the distant sound of seagull cries whilst glinting shoals of silver flee 'chasing birds'. News 'asphalt lines' are carved on Lithuanian highways: bass rich vibrations juxtaposed against Canadian melodic fluidity and razor-sharp German rhythms. The common thread sees Russian artistry weave a magical path from start to end on a journey that captures an ever-changing vista; a new 'panorama' brought once more into sharp focus by brilliance from a galaxy of stars
